address: Località Vallone dei Messi 199, SP 16/b km 2,400
description: You are certain to fall for the charm of this rural restaurant, whose excellent value for money attracts food - lovers from far and wide. Situated among olive groves and vineyards, the Osteria Magona serves a whole host of meat specialities with tartare, beef delicacies and roast dishes all featuring on the menu.
